frames module¶

Get frames from lammps trajectory file. Dependency: numpy pandas math misc.file_len

frames.get_box(inpf, fn, natoms)¶

Get box from lammps traj file.

inpf : Input file name, [String] (format: id, atom type, xs, ys, zs) fn : Frame number, [int] natoms : Number of atoms, [int]

frames.get_frame_headers(inpf)¶

Get headers from lammps traj file.

inpf : Input file name, [String] (format: id, atom type, xs, ys, zs)

frames.get_frame_total(inpf)¶

Get total number of frames in lammps traj file.

inpf : Input file name, [String] (format: id, atom type, xs, ys, zs)

frames.get_frames(inpf, fn=[1], variable_size=False)¶

Get specific frame from lammps traj file.

Parameters inpf : Input file name, [String] (format: id, atom type, xs, ys, zs) fn : List of frame number natoms : Number of total atoms

frames.get_natoms(inpf)¶

Get natoms from lammps traj file.

inpf : Input file name, [String] (format: id, atom type, xs, ys, zs)
